name: Plebdev
headerTaglineThree: developer / educator / hacker / founder of plebdevs

projects.title: Plebdevs Community
projects.description: PlebDevs is a Bitcoin/Lightning App developer community focused on education, collaboration, and building hard skills.

projects.title: MakePrisms
projects.description: Worked on Lightning / Nostr integrated payments API and multiple fullstack apps that utilize the API.

projects.title: Stacker News
projects.description: Stacker News, the front page of Bitcoin. I worked on the frontend and backend of the project. I Implemented features like Bounties and Nostr crossposting.

projects.title: Fold App
projects.description: Earn bitcoin back on everything. Buy bitcoin with no fees. I worked on the frontend app. Deployed multiple features and bug fixes to both iOS and Android.

projects.title: Pulsar
projects.description: Pulsar is an encrypted nostr chat app that masks your metadata. It works by sending fixed-length, fixed-frequency messages over the nostr messaging network. I worked with supertestnet on this project, we sumbitted it for HRF's encrypted group chat bounty.

projects.title: Forethought AI
projects.description: Implemented AI products for startups and enterprises. Worked on multiple projects that utilized AI and Machine Learning. Built custom modles / datasets / pipelines for clients.

projects.title: Ln-Inbound
projects.description: An easy to deploy LND wrapper to sell inbound Lightning channels from your own node. Me and @cmdruid built this for the Bitcoin++ hackathon.

projects.title: Devstr
projects.description: Devstr is a prototype Github-like platform that uses Nostr for storing and broadcasting redundant repository data. Me and @btcretriever built this for the 2023 Austin SatsX hackathon and won the prize for the nostr category.

projects.title: pleb-post
projects.description: A full Stack Lightning Template App for learning and building your First lightning app. built with NextJS, LNBits, and Voltage.cloud This project was built as a part of my presentation 'Building your First Lightning App' at the Bitcoin++ conference.

projects.title: Fold App
projects.description: Earn bitcoin back on everything. Buy bitcoin with no fees. I worked on the frontend app. Deployed multiple features and bug fixes to both iOS and Android.

projects.title: Alby
projects.description: Contributed feature that allows users to tip on reddit and recognize lightning adresses on reddit user descriptions as well as extending the LUD-18 payer data capabilities for the wallet/extension.

services.title: Web / App Developer
services.description: Have worked across musltiple teams building and maintaining web applications. I have experience with React, Node, and other web technologies.

services.title: Bitcoin / Lightning Development
services.description: I have been working with Bitcoin and Lightning for the past 4 years. I have built multiple projects and have a deep understanding of the technology.

services.title: Developer Education
services.description: I have been teaching people how to code for the past 2 years. I run the plebdevs community, I've built multiple courses, I do live workshops, 1:1 tutoring, and more.

services.title: Nostr Development
services.description: I have been working with Nostr for the past 2 years. I have built multiple projects and have a deep understanding of the technology.

aboutpara: I started my development journey self-taught with a passion and curiosity for Bitcoin and a desire to build applications that leverage the technology. I started taking my programming journey more serious in 2019 when I joined the Lambda School (Now Bloomtech) Full Stack Developer Bootcamp. After completing my student status at Lambda I started working for the bootcamp as a Team Lead walking students through the full curriculum. This is when I discovered my love for teaching and developer education. In my carrer I have worked for multiple companies and startups as a developer touching everything from traditional web development, Backend Enterprise API development, crossplatform mobile development, and AI/ML implementation and development. My expertise lies in Bitcoin and Lightning development, App Development, and Developer Education. I have built a multitude of free open source apps within the Bitcoin/Lightning/Nostr ecosystem. Along with all of this I have also been running the Plebdevs community for the past 2 years. I have built multiple courses, do live workshops, 1:1 tutoring, and more. I am passionate about building and teaching and I am always looking for new opportunities to do so.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
